title: Software Quality Engineer, Employee Experience & Productivity
summary: If you find joy in enhancing software quality through automation and engineering excellence, we would love to have a conversation with you! As a quality engineer, you will drive quality engineering for our software products.
description: In this role, you will be responsible for developing and executing comprehensive testing strategies and plans for assigned projects and functional test areas. Your mandate will include expanding our existing test cases, conducting engineering quality testing, and ensuring the successful execution of required tests.
key_qualifications: At least three years of experience in Quality Engineering, with at least one year dedicated to software development, is preferred. Experience in Java programming and scripting languages (Perl, PHP, Python, etc.). Linux platforms and relational databases. Strong analytical problem-solving skills and looking beyond what’s obvious. Experience working with multiple geo-located teams. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. See yourself working in a fast-paced environment.
education_experience: BS in Computer Science or equivalent.
